articles.caption: A look at Prime Gaming's user engagements
articles.title: Prime Gaming user engagement increased 25% in 2022 | VentureBeat
articles.description: Amazon revealed how Prime Gaming performed in 2022, including stats on its free games and user response. According to Amazon, the number of subscribers who claimed free games increased by 25%, and the value of the games on offer increased as well.
